components: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL,UNKNOWN OR OTHER
summary: TRUCK LOCKED UP ON ME ON THE HIGHWAY DOING 70+ MPH & CAUSED ME TO SPIN OUT & WRECK. IT'S A RECALL FOR THAT ISSUE THAT FORD WILL NOT FIX FOR ME BECAUSE OF MILEAGE. TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE & ENDANGERED MY LIFE & OTHERS THAT DAY FOR A ISSUE THAT THEY'RE RESPONSIBLE FOR.
